Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.Dashboard
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountDashboard
public class Dashboard
extends java.lang.Object
this class implements all methods of a personal dashboard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
      Dashboard()
    this constructor create each object but don't initialize anything, indeed when the game starts warehouse, strongbox , the buffer and personal production power are empty
    protected Dashboard​(Dashboard dashboard)
    this constructor is used to initialize DiscountDashboard when a player activate a leader card that generate a discount when someone buy a development card from market

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activateLeaderProduction​(Resource toCreate)
    this method is used to create/activate a leader production.
    void activateLeaderWarehouse​(Resource toCreate)
    this method is called when the player activate a shelf leader card, and it create a new leader shelf
    void addDiscount​(Resource discount)
    here this method do NOTHING. this method is used in discountDashboard
    int addResourcesToWarehouse​(CollectionResources toAdd, int numShelf)
    this method insert a resource in warehouse
    void addToBuffer​(CollectionResources toAdd)
    this method is used to add all of resources obtained from production power into the buffer
    void fillStrongboxWithBuffer()
    this method insert in strongbox all resources contained in buffer
    CollectionResources getBuffer()
    this method is a getter of the buffer
    CollectionResources getDiscount()
    here this method do NOTHING. this method is used in discountDashboard
    ProductionPower getPersonalProductionPower()
    this method is a getter of personalProductionPower
    StrongBox getPersonalStrongbox()
    this method is a getter of personalStrongbox
    Warehouse getPersonalWarehouse()
    this method is a getter of personalWarehouse
    CollectionResources getTotalDiscountResource()
    this method is a getter, when a player activate a leader card that generate a discount we save the discount resource in CollectionResource and this method is used to see the state of this collection
    CollectionResources getTotalResources()
    this method get the resources contained in the dashboard, getting them from warehouse and strongbox
    int getVictoryPoints()
    this method count some victoryPoints.
    boolean placeDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
    this method is used to locate a card in one of the three position in dashboard.
    boolean removeFromStrongbox​(CollectionResources toRemove)
    this method is used to remove resources from strongBox, if there aren't enough resources the method return false
    boolean removeFromWarehouse​(CollectionResources toRemove)
    this method is used to remove resources from Warehouse, if there aren't enough resources the method return false
    int shiftShelfResources​(int source, int destination)
    this method is used to shift resources between two shelves,

  • Constructor Details

    • Dashboard

      public Dashboard()
      this constructor create each object but don't initialize anything, indeed when the game starts warehouse, strongbox , the buffer and personal production power are empty

    • Dashboard

      protected Dashboard​(Dashboard dashboard)
      this constructor is used to initialize DiscountDashboard when a player activate a leader card that generate a discount when someone buy a development card from market
      Parameters:
      dashboard - is the actual dashboard

  • Method Details

    • getPersonalWarehouse

      public Warehouse getPersonalWarehouse()
      this method is a getter of personalWarehouse
      Returns:
      the state of player personalWarehouse,so we can see and use all resources contained in this strongbox

    • getPersonalProductionPower

      public ProductionPower getPersonalProductionPower()
      this method is a getter of personalProductionPower
      Returns:
      the state of personalProductionPower that a player has activated

    • getBuffer

      public CollectionResources getBuffer()
      this method is a getter of the buffer
      Returns:
      all resources contained in buffer

    • getPersonalStrongbox

      public StrongBox getPersonalStrongbox()
      this method is a getter of personalStrongbox
      Returns:
      the state of a player personalStrongbox, so we can see and use all resources contained in this strongbox

    • shiftShelfResources

      public int shiftShelfResources​(int source, int destination)
      this method is used to shift resources between two shelves,
      Parameters:
      source - contains the number associate to a shelf. this is the shelf where i take the resource
      destination - contains the number associate to a shelf. this is the shelf where i put the resource contained in source shelf
      Returns:
      the number of discarded resources

    • placeDevelopmentCard

      public boolean placeDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
      this method is used to locate a card in one of the three position in dashboard.
      Parameters:
      position - is =1 or =2 or =3; is the position where the card is locate in dashboard
      toPlace - contains the developmentCard that the player wants to insert in dashboard
      Returns:
      true if the card has been correctly inserted, else false

    • fillStrongboxWithBuffer

      public void fillStrongboxWithBuffer()
      this method insert in strongbox all resources contained in buffer

    • removeFromStrongbox

      public boolean removeFromStrongbox​(CollectionResources toRemove)
      this method is used to remove resources from strongBox, if there aren't enough resources the method return false
      Parameters:
      toRemove - contains the resources that a player wants to take from strongbox
      Returns:
      true if this operation is a success else false

    • removeFromWarehouse

      public boolean removeFromWarehouse​(CollectionResources toRemove)
      this method is used to remove resources from Warehouse, if there aren't enough resources the method return false
      Parameters:
      toRemove - contains the resources that a player wants to take from warehouse
      Returns:
      true if this operation is a success else false

    • addToBuffer

      public void addToBuffer​(CollectionResources toAdd)
      this method is used to add all of resources obtained from production power into the buffer
      Parameters:
      toAdd - contains all resources to add in the buffer

    • addResourcesToWarehouse

      public int addResourcesToWarehouse​(CollectionResources toAdd, int numShelf)
      this method insert a resource in warehouse
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource that a player want to insert in warehouse
      numShelf - this is the number of warehouse shelf
      Returns:
      the number of rejected resources

    • activateLeaderProduction

      public void activateLeaderProduction​(Resource toCreate)
      this method is used to create/activate a leader production. "toCreate" is the resource that a player has to pay to activate the leaderProduction
      Parameters:
      toCreate - is the resource that the player want to obtain from leaderProduction

    • activateLeaderWarehouse

      public void activateLeaderWarehouse​(Resource toCreate)
      this method is called when the player activate a shelf leader card, and it create a new leader shelf
      Parameters:
      toCreate - this is the resource of the leader shelf associated with the leader card

    • getTotalResources

      public CollectionResources getTotalResources()
      this method get the resources contained in the dashboard, getting them from warehouse and strongbox
      Returns:
      a collection with all the resources

    • getTotalDiscountResource

      public CollectionResources getTotalDiscountResource()
      this method is a getter, when a player activate a leader card that generate a discount we save the discount resource in CollectionResource and this method is used to see the state of this collection
      Returns:
      the list of discounted resources

    • getVictoryPoints

      public int getVictoryPoints()
      this method count some victoryPoints. It count all of card contained in dashboard and divide this number for 5; then sum all victoryPoints written on each card present in dashboard
      Returns:
      the sum of victory points relative to development card in dashboard and the total of resources owned

    • getDiscount

      public CollectionResources getDiscount()
      here this method do NOTHING. this method is used in discountDashboard
      Returns:
      an empty collection

    • addDiscount

      public void addDiscount​(Resource discount)
      here this method do NOTHING. this method is used in discountDashboard
